Episodes.Title: Kite
Episodes.Plot: Strong winds bring telegraph poles down and take Sarah and James' kite high up, but a little higher than they intended.

Episodes.Title: Barn Fire
Episodes.Plot: On a very hot day, Sarah and James are picking potatoes for Bella. Sam wonders if he can help, but first he has to deal with a barn fire at Pandy Lane Farm.

Episodes.Title: Trevor's Training
Episodes.Plot: It's routine drill for Trevor on his first day in the fire service, until a message comes over the radio.

Episodes.Title: Flat Tyre
Episodes.Plot: After going to a boot-sale, Trevor's  tyre goes flat and invades Pontypandy and loads of delays, luckilly Fireman Sam goes to the rescue.

Episodes.Title: Camping
Episodes.Plot: What have a frog and an oily rag got to do with camping? Sam, Sarah and James soon find out.

Episodes.Title: Norman's Tricky Day
Episodes.Plot: Norman is up to his old tricks as usual, but this time he plays one too many!

Episodes.Title: Lost Cat
Episodes.Plot: Saturdays are busy enough for Bella, without having to deal with chip pan fires and lost cats.
